title: Ui/Ux Design
text: I prefer design that is bold in color, vibrant and offers a great user experience that inspires users as well as promotes retention. I have worked in Ui/Ux for 4+ years and have received many accolades for my work.

title: Web Development
text: From everything from WordPress, to React, Vue, Three.js, Wix and Shopify - I've built it all and love the challenge of a new design as well as adding interactive elements that engage the user.

title: Mobile App Development
text: Mobile apps are fun, versatile and I love combining them with web applications for additional features and a better user experience across generations.
